member.name: T:Gadgeteer.Modules.GHIElectronics.Motion_Sensor
member.summary: A passive infrared module that is used to detect motion in the module's field of view for Microsoft .NET Gadgeteer.

example.para: The following example uses a object to detect motion and raise an event.

member.name: E:Gadgeteer.Modules.GHIElectronics.Motion_Sensor.Motion_Sensed
member.summary: Raised when the state of is high.
member.remarks: Implement this event handler when you want to provide an action associated with Motion_Sensor activity. The state of the Motion_Sensor is passed to the delegate, so you can use the same event handler for both Motion_Sensor states.

member.name: F:Gadgeteer.Modules.GHIElectronics.Motion_Sensor.Motion_SensorState.Busy
